languages.text: "Тогда вернемся к тому, что я требую. Душа Иремерисс и мое право на нее".
"Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."
languages.original_text: "Тогда вернемся к тому, что я требую. Душа Иремерисс и мое право на нее".

traits.locale_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “既然如此，回到我要求的事情上来吧。我要伊芮梅莉斯的灵魂，以及我亲手杀掉她的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，回到我要求的事情上来吧。我要伊芮梅莉斯的灵魂，以及我亲手杀掉她的权利。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「なら、俺の指令の話に戻ろうか。イレメリスの魂と、奴を殺す権利についてだ」
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: 「なら、俺の指令の話に戻ろうか。イレメリスの魂と、奴を殺す権利についてだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Entonces volvamos a mis instrucciones. El alma de Yremeryss y mi derecho a cobrarme su vida».
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces volvamos a mis instrucciones. El alma de Yremeryss y mi derecho a cobrarme su vida».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, revenons-en plutôt à ce qui nous occupe : l'âme d'Yremeryss et mon droit à la tuer. »
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, revenons-en plutôt à ce qui nous occupe : l'âme d'Yremeryss et mon droit à la tuer. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Dann gilt weiterhin meine Anweisung. Yremeryss' Seele und mein Recht, sie zu töten."
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: "Dann gilt weiterhin meine Anweisung. Yremeryss' Seele und mein Recht, sie zu töten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

languages.text: "O zaman talimatlarıma dönelim. Yremeryss'ın ruhu ve onu öldürme hakkıma yani."
languages.original_text: "Then let us return to my instructions. Yremeryss's soul and my right to kill her."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman talimatlarıma dönelim. Yremeryss'ın ruhu ve onu öldürme hakkıma yani."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
